scripts._dist: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap && npm run build && lerna run dist
scripts.test-check: if [ "$RUN_PHANTOMJS" = "1" ]; then npm run-script test-phantomjs; else npm run-script test-node; fi
scripts.test-phantomjs: cd packages/tests && npm run dist-phantomjs && phantomjs --web-security=false ../../node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js ./test.html ./tests/reporter.js
scripts.test-aion: npm run dist && npm run test-aion-node
scripts.update-versions: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap && npm run build && node ./admin/cmds/update-versions
